sentences.en: A trait of character of Joe Patronil's was a white - hot.
sentences.cn: 乔·佩特罗尼是个烈性子.

sentences.en: Aggression is by no means a male-only trait.
sentences.cn: 好斗性绝非男性才具有的特征。

sentences.en: But what distinguished the physician's ecstasy from Satan's was the trait of wonder in it!
sentences.cn: 不过,那医生的狂喜同撒旦的区别在于,其中尚有惊奇的成分!
创造力是人类的一种特性。

sentences.en: Eleven shape coding can effectively indicate the trait of Chinese character.
sentences.cn: 十一形码编码方法能够表征汉字的本质特征.

sentences.en: Honor was a trait handed down from generation to generation in the Roti family.
sentences.cn: 讲道义是罗迪家中世传的美德.

sentences.en: If he had one abiding trait, it was his desire of astonishing people.
sentences.cn: 如果说他有什么经常性的癖好的话, 那就是他老想惹人吃惊.

sentences.en: It was imprudent for France to indulge this trait when she was so grievously weakened.
sentences.cn: 法国在遭到如此严重削弱的关头,便犯这种脾气,那是很轻率的事.

sentences.en: It's a genetic trait that causes deafness at an early age.
sentences.cn: 早期耳聋是基因缺陷造成的.

sentences.en: Repose of manner is an estimable trait in a horse.
sentences.cn: 神情镇定是一匹马可贵的特质.

sentences.en: The priest preached a sermon with a trait of humor.
sentences.cn: 那位神父讲道有幽默感.

sentences.en: The study found that some alcoholics had clear personality traits showing up early in childhood.
sentences.cn: 这项研究发现一些酗酒者早在孩童时就表现出明显的个性特征。

sentences.en: They suddenly exhibit a striking new trait.
sentences.cn: 它们突然呈现出一种新的显著特征.

sentences.en: This also made him moody and bad - tempered, a trait that would persist and lose him friends.
sentences.cn: 这也使得他闷闷不乐,脾气暴躁, 长此以往,就和朋友们疏远了.

sentences.en: This disorder is inherited as an autosomal dominant trait.
sentences.cn: 本病作为常染色体显性传递.

trans.tran_en: a particular quality in someone’s character
